Sam Hunting wrote,
> I wonder if an arc could be a channel?

That's a bit cryptic for someone like me who knows virtually nothing 
about Topic Maps ... care to elaborate?

My wild guess is that the answer is "maybe" but only with a bit of 
reinterpretation of TM. In pi, channels link processes. In TM I suppose 
arcs relate topics. So, if it makes any kind of sense to think of a 
topic as a process, there might be a corrspondance between arcs and 
channels.

Cheers,


Miles
